Articles.Content:
I have ksp enhanced edition. I started ksp on enhance ed. Now I make my not so glorious return! I don't know how to get ps4 screenshots on a computer, so this is going to be written, but if you can tell me how, that'd be great.

I've decided to do career mode.
I'm starting with a basic "Jumping Flea" style craft named "Pain 1" in anticipation of how annoying Enhancd Edition will be.
Bad sign already. It didn't automatically add crew to my rocket.
SAS engaged.
Goo Observed.
Launching.
Goo observed again. Returning.
Mission 1 successful. 
19 science gained.
I've bought the first 2 nodes and I'm ready to do more tomorrow!

Edited October 11, 2022 by Rutabaga22

Time for round 2 with the "Pain 2"
2 hammer stages and a swivel upper stage

liftoff is fine
Temp scan 1
SRB 2 activated
SRB 1 'sploded
Liquid stage sep
Goo 1 observed
Temp scan 2
Space music engaged. Enabling goo 2.
retrograde for reentry
pretty toasty
Jeb  deathed. The pain 2 was ahead of its time. 
Goodnight y'all.
